description: Darth Vader and crew have begun the reign of the Empire in Star Wars Shatterpoint. title: How to Paint Everything: Star Wars Shatterpoint Fear & Dead Men Squad Pack

description: With over 20 affiliations and counting, getting started in Marvel: Crisis Protocol can be a daunting task. title: Marvel: Crisis Protocol Choosing an Affiliation Part 4 – Midnight Sons, Sentinels, SHIELD and Spider-Foes

description: Magic’s newest expansion takes us to the newly introduced plane of Duskmourn, a plane comprised entirely of a living haunted mansion that thrives on the fear of its denizens. title: Magic: the Gathering Duskmourn Review, Part 1 of 4: The Mechanics
